thread.title: The Guide to Get Inside: Los Angeles
thread.title_full: The Guide to Get Inside: Los Angeles | Maxim

author: Maxim Staff
title: The Guide to Get Inside: Los Angeles
text:
Sponsored by SKYN
Where to LAY
CHATEAU MARMONT
You may be surprised with what the Chateau Marmont brings out in you. Nestled in the hills with an Old Hollywood feel, this hotel’s unique and luxurious setting creates an overall feeling that is simply unmatched. You won’t have a reason to leave.
HOTEL CASA DEL MAR
This Santa Monica oceanfront getaway spot should appear in the dictionary under paradise . It embodies the perfect mix of energy and seclusion, giving you every possible option for when the moment is right.
L’ ERMITAGE, BEVERLY HILLS
Located in the heart of Beverly Hills, L’ Ermitage is one of California’s top luxury hotels. Modeled to give guests an urban feel, while it exudes the spirit of a private club. With guests from all across the globe, you never know who might pop in.
HOTEL FIGUEROA
Hotel Figueroa is a true escape from downtown LA, providing an oasis of luxury, beauty, and seclusion. With a truly authentic look and feel, and convenient location, this Hollywood property is our favorite spot to kick back after the director yells “cut!”
Where to PLAY
CINESPIA
Cinespia’s Hollywood Forever Cemetery outdoor movie theatre is anything but dead. With one of the most unique cinematic experiences in the world, you never know what may rise up.
GRIFFITH OBSERVATORY
For an incredible, cheap date go-to this free observatory will leave her breathless. With telescopes looking over the entire city, your biggest problem will be figuring out what to show her next.
THE LAST BOOKSTORE
The name, “ The Last Bookstore ,” was chosen with irony although with each day forward, the name begins to make more sense. Show her your intellectual side, and she’ll be confident that you can read her desires.
MAISON 140
Maison 140 is a gorgeous luxury hotel in Beverly Hills located near some of the best shopping in California. If she loves to shop, take her here to buy yourself time to make the next move.
Where to SAVOR
THE BAZAAR
Often described as a truly magical dining experience, Chef José Andrés’ cutting-edge Spanish flavors will keep the night hot. Dine here to show her that you’re ready to spice things up.
FAITH AND FLOWER
Located in South Park district, Faith and Flower specializes in California’s rustic cuisine, with an exclusive raw bar and wood-fired oven techniques. The warm atmosphere will help forge an intimate connection, and might even entice her to try something new.
ODYS AND PENELOPE
This small town restaurant comes with big town taste. Odys and Penelope boasts a Brazilian churrasco, giving incredibly unique flavors to each piece of meat they dish out. You might learn a thing or two.
KATSUYA
For incredible Japanese cuisine that gets rave reviews, year after year, Katsuya is your answer. With celebrities flocking to dine on Chef Katsuya Uechi’s incredible and unique dishes, Katsuya is where you buy her a dinner to steal her heart.
Where to SIP
THE EDISON
Located in an Industrial Cathedral from one of LA’s first private power plants, bring her here to try their incredible artisanal cocktails. You won’t need to re-invent the light bulb to surprise her, but this hotspot will definitely spark ideas on what to do next.
SEVEN GRAND
Seven Grand is the essential location for whiskey drinkers. With its huge menu of spirits and custom libations, stop by if you’re in the mood to try something new.
THE VARNISH
This intimate venue hosts a slew of jazz nights throughout the week, making it a great place to sit back and relax with her after a long day at the office. This stands as one of the classiest venues in Los Angeles, featuring a strict ban on vulgar language. Save the dirty stuff for later.
RIVERA
Rivera is unlike any other bar in Los Angeles, with a menu of imported Spanish drink recipes that you simply won’t find anywhere else. Show off your attention to detail by treating her to cocktails as unique as she is.
